item.title: The Evolution Of Platform Engineering With Massdriver CEO Cory O’Daniel
item.description: Dive into the ever-evolving world of platform engineering with Cory O’Daniel, CEO and co-founder of Massdriver. This episode explores the journey of DevOps, the challenges of building and scaling infrastructure, and the crucial role of creating effective abstractions to empower developers. Cory shares his insights on the shift towards platform engineering as a means to build more secure and efficient software by default. Feed: https://feeds.simplecast.com/47yfLpm0

item.title: Interview with Mario Kranjac: NJ Governor Hopeful Discusses Law and Order, School Choice, and More
item.description: On this episode of The Yossi Schmidt Show, guest Mario Kranjac, former Mayor of Englewood Cliffs, discusses his eight-year tenure and his self-imposed term limits. Now running for Governor of New Jersey, he outlines his key campaign promises including restoring law and order, eliminating sanctuary state status, and reducing waste in the state budget. He advocates for school choice, removing public employee unions, and prioritizing clean and effective energy solutions... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/441cf4f0/podcast/rss
